title: Can't load the loading screen? ( It's pretty ironic )
body: I'm pretty new to league, and so I was going to play a custom with some friends to try it out. I went into champ select, chose my champ and waited. After everyone locked in and all that, my screen went pitch black when everyone else went to the loading screen. Looking for a fix because my friends always talk about playing league and i don't wanna be left out LMAO

replies.body:
Hey PremeTeamScheme!

I'm sorry to hear that there were problems with the loading screen. Let's get back you
to the Justice of Field!

This problem is usually caused by a firewall installed on a computer. If you didn't install any firewall, Windows still contains the default firewall, so in order to play a LoL smoothly, you need to make sure that your settings are correct!
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3

If this did not helped you, turn off your Windows Firewall and

Press "windows" and "R" simultaneously.
Type "services.msc" in the box and press enter.
Scroll down and find the "Windows Firewall" in the list.
Right click on "Windows Firewall" and select the "Properties" tab.
Change the "Startup type" to "Disabled"
Press "OK"
Follow the same steps for "Windows Defender".
Restart your computer.

If the problem still exists, please make sure to get help from a Riot Games Player Support Specialist.

"All you need is a good help from the right person"

Bentron
Just a Player from League
Not Riot Games

(had the same problem)

I just forgot that you have to change your DNS to 8.8.8.8 , 8.8.4.4

(YouTube can help you in it)

Welcome to League!  Don't worry, we can get you caught up and playing with your friends!  This black screen usually happens if your network is having a problem reaching the game server.  Your connection might otherwise seem okay but you can still have problems getting to specific services, like in this case.  I recommend running through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and make sure there's nothing blocking your way to us.  I hope that helps!

I don't think i have a connection issue. I have windows 10, so whenever I tab out from the black screen, it shows my desktop and taskbar and stuff right? So if I hover over the league icon on my taskbar, it shows me in game, but whenever I try and open it, it goes black. ( Probably should have included that )

It's ultimately up to you to go over the steps, but the issues you're reporting here do suggest a failure to download assets.  Going over that guide will help rule out possibilities, but more than likely should resolve this problem.  Good luck!
